meta_title: How to Detect Maintenance Problems Before Breakdown
meta_description: Detect maintenance problems before breakdown by monitoring the P-F Interval using vibration analysis, thermography, and ultrasound to identify potential failure.
title: How to Detect Maintenance Problems Before Breakdown: A Technical Guide to the P-F Interval
keyword: how to detect maintenance problems before breakdown

image_prompt: A high-tech industrial setting where a maintenance engineer in a hard hat and safety glasses is using a handheld tablet to view a P-F Curve graph. The lighting is professional and clean, showing a modern manufacturing floor with high-end machinery. No text in the image. Photo-realistic style.
